page.title: 10CAUSES FOR CONCERN IN DUFTON
page.content: Some topics always lead to discussion. At present the proposal that this area be an AONB is one.The supporters of the idea are mainly conservationists, some among our visitors.But some farm- ers & other locals fear it would lead to greater difficulties with planning etc.They do not see it bringing more jobs to the area,followed by income, which is needed.We are close to the Lake District National Park where some locals are unhappy.Some feel we don't want more tourists & that the farming has kept this area in its natural beauty.Another topic is the provision of amenities especially for tourists, toilets,bus parks etc.To some,the lack of these is a nuisance,but no-one can contemplate them being put in the village centre.Village depopulation worries people as it leads in turn to loss of services, schools & more.
